subject: Masters Golf Tournament
Golf
lead_paragraph: Peter Hanson of Sweden shot a spectacular 65 to lead the Masters at nine under, but Phil Mickelson got the galleries roaring with a back-nine surge in the third round.
snippet: Peter Hanson of Sweden shot a spectacular 65 to lead the Masters at nine under, but Phil Mickelson got the galleries roaring with a back-nine surge in the third round.
